MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Craigpark and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing network investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.05am on 10th February 2021.
